fields.name: projectId

type.connect.doc: Project identifier. Null if unknown or the user is not enrolled in a project.

fields.doc: Project identifier. Null if unknown or the user is not enrolled in a project.

fields.name: userId

type.connect.doc: User Identifier created during the enrolment.

fields.doc: User Identifier created during the enrolment.

fields.name: sourceId

type.connect.doc: Unique identifier associated with the source.

type.name: PhoneSms
type.doc: Data from log sent and received text messages.

fields.name: target

type.connect.doc: HMAC SHA-256 one-way source/target of the SMS. This hash of a given phone number will be the same unless the app is reinstalled. If the number is unknown or anonymous, this contains null.

fields.doc: HMAC SHA-256 one-way source/target of the SMS. This hash of a given phone number will be the same unless the app is reinstalled. If the number is unknown or anonymous, this contains null.

fields.name: length

type.connect.doc: Number of characters in the message (null if unknown).

fields.doc: Number of characters in the message (null if unknown).

fields.name: targetIsContact

type.connect.doc: Sms sender is a known contact (null if unknown).

fields.doc: Sms sender is a known contact (null if unknown).

fields.name: targetIsNonNumeric

type.connect.doc: Sms sender ID is replaced by text, e.g. a company name.

fields.doc: Sms sender ID is replaced by text, e.g. a company name.

fields.name: targetLength

type.connect.doc: Length of the target phone number, -1 if not collected.
